description: The Nike Everyday Plus Cushioned Socks bring comfort to your workout with extra cushioning under the heel and forefoot and a snug, supportive arch band. Sweat-wicking power and breathability up top help keep your feet dry and cool to help push you through that extra set.

title: Nike Multiplier

description: Rock a retro look in the Nike Everyday Plus socks. Inspired by 1970s Nike origins, these socks use sweat-wicking technology to keep your feet comfortable, whether it's hitting the gym or jogging your local track on a sunny day.

description: The Nike and Stüssy partnership started in the year 2000, and continues today. As part of that collection, the Nike x Stüssy Socks feature Nike's classic, comfortable sock and Stüssy's iconic logo. The moisture-wicking fabric helps keep your feet dry and cosy, and its stretchy fabric forms to your foot without becoming baggy.

title: Nike Elite
description: The Nike Elite NBA Crew Socks are the players' choice for snug comfort and support. They're made from premium knit yarns with sweat-wicking technology and cushioning where it counts. The socks are badged with the NBA's logo and marked vertically down the back with Nike Basketball's top-tier Elite stripe.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh
description: Wherever your path takes you, this easy-fitting, sweat-wicking top is designed to help keep you feeling dry and comfortable. And, no need to check your eyes: a double Swoosh graphic mimics movement to inspire you to keep going.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh
description: Keep pushing through your miles in this slightly cropped, easy-fitting top. Its sweat-wicking tech and lightweight fabric help keep you comfortable from start to finish.

title: Nike Forward Shorts
description: Temps are on the rise, but that's no reason to not be cosy. These high-waisted Nike Forward shorts pack in the comfort of your favourite fleece in a crisp, clean look you can count on to keep you feeling your best.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Proudly rep gear that supports the ladies on the court in this tee. Made from heavyweight cotton and a loose fit, it has a roomy, extra comfortable feel.

title: Nike SB
description: Mixing the energy of the city with power of the natural world, this heavyweight fleece skate crew is cut with some room through the shoulders, chest and body for easy movement and layering.

title: Nike Everyday Plus
description: Getting the most out of your workout shouldn't be compromised by aching feet. These socks feature cushioning on the forefoot and heel to provide that extra buffer, and sweat-wicking technology is there too, for when your workout turns turbo.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Slam
description: From overheads to ground strokes, navigate the highs and lows of your game in this tight, airy mesh tank top. A high neckline offers modesty through your dynamic moves, while sweat-wicking tech and strategically placed cut-outs help keep you cool and comfy.

title: Nike Sportswear
category: Women's Sleeveless Jersey Wave Dye Top
description: Make waves in this loose, cropped muscle tee. Soft, lightweight fabric helps you stay comfy and cool, while a fresh take on tie-dye gives you a one-of-a kind, vibrant look.

title: Naomi Osaka
description: Stay comfy and stylish on your rest days in this Naomi Osaka graphic tee. The funky flower pattern and grounding hues create a playful yet focused vibe. The roomy fit and soft cotton make it perfect to throw on over a long-sleeve or under a jumper.

title: Jordan (Her)itage
description: Take your outfit to new heights with the updated Jordan Flight Suit, styled as versatile separates or one cohesive look. Designed to fall just below the waist, the quarter-zip top has heritage design lines and rib-knit details that are sure to stand out in your wardrobe. The zip pull features a removable "23" charm—add it to a chain, bracelet or even your shoes.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: Keep your look sweet in this loose-fitting top. Sweat-wicking tech and a print inspired by a beloved tournament snack help keep you feeling fresh.

title: Jordan x Teyana Taylor
description: Infused with Teyana Taylor's boundless creativity and signature Jordan design DNA, this collection celebrates anyone who's overcome a struggle. Like roses in concrete, there's no boxing you in and nowhere you can't flourish. This two-tone top has a tight, cropped fit and a touch of Y2K style. The mesh gives an all-over sheerness to your look, and a raised silicone print on the hem gives a tactile feel to Teyana's signature rose logo.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Meet your new effortless go-to for everyday wear. Perfect on its own or layered under your favourite gilet, this body-hugging mock-neck top gives you multiple styling options. Embroidered details add a touch of sporty university style.

title: Jordan Flight
description: Oversized but understated, this denim trucker jacket is your new go-to. With plenty of room for layering and a streamlined design, it's a wardrobe workhorse. Whether it's your outfit's subtle centrepiece or just one part of a bold look, options are endless with this staple item.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential
description: Running errands and kicking back has never felt this good. These shorts balance a sporty look and casual feel perfectly so you can focus on getting on with your day. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester and recycled nylon fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Icon Clash
description: Choose your own adventure with this spacious top. Its built-in sash helps you style it your way, while its relaxed fit ensures a casual, comfortable feel. This product is made from at least 75% organic cotton fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Dri-FIT
description: Ready to rock a bold look that's still comfy? Reach for this oversized tee. A playful graphic on heavyweight cotton fabric powered by sweat-wicking technology gives you a clean, confident look you can wear every day of the year.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh
description: Whether you're racking up the miles or jogging to the corner shop, this relaxed, sweat-wicking tank top helps keep you feeling comfortable. And, no need to check your eyes: the double Swoosh graphic mimics movement to inspire you to keep going.

title: England 2023 Stadium Away
description: Bold geometry drives the design of the England 2023 Away jersey, which uses 2 shades of blue to create an all-over print full of depth and dimension. A deconstructed England graphic hidden on the inside further adds to the shirt's modern look. Like other jerseys in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Lionesses.

title: Nike Sportswear Essentials
description: In this lightweight, loose-fitting bomber, you can cover up without hiding your style. Smooth Ripstop fabric is structured but sheer, so you can let your favourite prints and colours shine through.

title: Nike ACG Polartec® 'Wolf Tree'
description: Wet weather doesn't mean you have to stop exploring. Inspired by Oregon's Smith Rock, the Nike ACG Polartec ® 'Wolf Tree' Trousers were thoughtfully made from 100% recycled polyester fibres. Its soft fleece helps keep you warm in some of the most frigid temps. The straight-leg design gives you a traditional fit and feel. Zipped storage keeps your essentials close.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: The Nike Dri-FIT One Top is our most versatile shirt, designed for all the ways you work out—from the machines to the mat to the miles. Soft, smooth fabric comes in a breathable silhouette to help keep you cool and dry. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Naomi Osaka
description: Express yourself as you mix, match and move from one place to the next in these flowy, easy-fitting shorts. Unveiling Naomi's story and Japanese roots, the shy, muted colours bloom into a bold floral print. A sewn-in fabric belt on the elastic waistband can be tied snugly or kept loose—just make it your own, like Naomi would.

title: Australia 2023 Stadium Home
description: How do you design a shirt for a country unlike any other? You zero in on its uniqueness. An all-over marbled pattern draws on the golden wattle to give the Australia 2023 Home shirt a one-of-a-kind look that celebrates Australia's diverse communities and bright footballing future. A hidden graphic on the inside reads "For All", a nod to the spirit in which the national team plays. Like other shirts in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Matildas.

title: Nike Sportswear Collection
description: Double up on texture and shape in this stretchy, body-skimming top. Inspired by heritage Nike Sportswear, the design refreshes a staple with cut-out details that help reshape your warm-weather wardrobe.

title: Nike Alate All U
category: Women's Light-Support Padded Ribbed Sports Bra
description: From dawn to dusk, the Alate All U bra moves naturally with you. Light support gives you a gentle hold with plenty of freedom that's great for low-impact workouts or all-day comfort. 2 removable pads let you choose your coverage and the soft, stretchy ribbed fabric feels like a second skin so your bra will be the last thing on your mind.

title: Jordan x Teyana Taylor
description: Infused with Teyana Taylor's boundless creativity and signature Jordan design DNA, this collection celebrates anyone who's overcome a struggle. Like roses in concrete, there's no boxing you in and nowhere you can't flourish. The crackled-effect screen-printing gives this relaxed tee a vintage look and feel—and gender-neutral sizing means anyone can wear it and make it their own.

title: Nike Dri-FIT UV Advantage
description: Made for layering, this top combines a relaxed fit with a 1/2-length zip so you can adjust your coverage as conditions change. A little room in the arms allows you to move through your swing with ease.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: The Nike Dri-FIT One Tank is our most versatile top, designed for all the ways you work out—from the machines to the mat to the miles. Soft, smooth fabric comes in a breathable silhouette to keep you cool and dry. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Modern Fleece
category: Women's Oversized French Terry Crew-Neck Sweatshirt
description: We obsessed over every stitch and finish to create a crew neck you can wear anywhere. Densely knit, with unbrushed loops on the inside, its thick French terry fabric helps keep you warm and comfortable. The shoulder pleats and dart details add sharp lines and a tailored look to this sweatshirt, while an oversized fit feels casual enough for everyday wear.

title: Nike Swift UV
description: Stay protected from harmful rays in this running jacket. Unbelievably lightweight and breathable, it's equipped with UV protection so you can stay covered and cool. When the sun gets intense overhead, tuck into the hood to shade your face. Extend your coverage even further with the visor, or snap the visor and hood back when you don't need them.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Slam
description: From overheads to ground strokes, navigate the highs and lows of your game in this slim-fitting, airy mesh dress. A high neckline and a double-panelled skirt offer modesty through your dynamic moves. Sweat-wicking tech and strategically placed cut-outs help keep you cool and comfy.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One Elastika
description: The Nike Dri-FIT One Elastika Tank is our most versatile top, designed for all the ways you work out—from the machines to the mat to the miles. Soft, smooth fabric (made from 100% recycled polyester fibres) comes in a breathable silhouette to keep you cool and dry.

title: Nike ACG
description: For adventures big and small, it's always nice to have some extra room to move. Wider through the leg, these stretchy, high-waisted shorts are the perfect fit for days on the trail and in the hammock.

title: Nike Air Dri-FIT
description: Feel light as air in this lightweight, breathable top. A tailored fit and plenty of stretch keep you feeling sleek, while airy mesh panels with sweat-wicking tech help you stay cool. Plus, the curved bottom hem helps keep you covered while you power through your stride.

title: Nike Sportswear Everyday Modern
category: Women's High-Waisted Wide-Leg French Terry Trousers
description: Made to flow around your legs, these wide-leg trousers are perfect for cruising through busy weeks and coasting into long weekends. Smooth on the outside with unbrushed loops on the inside, their French terry fabric helps create breathability, so they're comfy enough for you to wear all year long, no matter what the temperature is.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Whether you're warming up, slinging weights or just lounging on your rest day, stay comfortable in this easy-fitting, sweat-wicking hoodie made for your everyday moves. Its midweight French terry fabric (with unbrushed loops on the inside) gives structure, breathability and softness—so it's just as ready for the gym as it is for the sofa.

title: Nike Sportswear Tech Pack
description: Simplify your approach to colder temps with the help of this easy-to-layer bodysuit. The knit fabric feels compressive and helps keep you warm and dry, while its body-skimming design makes it a natural for layering.

title: Jordan (Her)itage
description: Take your outfit to new heights with the updated Jordan Flight Suit. This season's look is split into a versatile set that can be styled as separate pieces or one cohesive look. Whatever you pair 'em with, these trousers will have you ready to walk into any situation—complete with bold press studs on the leg to show off your freshest pair of J's.

title: Nike Sportswear Dri-FIT Tech Pack
description: Move easily from one task to the next in this cropped, woven polo. Made with Dri-FIT Technology to help keep you cool and dry, it's an extra-airy, relaxed-fitting option perfect for warmer days. The darts on the bottom hem add a tailored look.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Slam
description: Serve with confidence in this snug-fitting, moisture-wicking dress. Made from a mix of mesh fabrics, you can run the court without worrying about sweat. The 2-layer skirt flows and flares with you as you move.

title: Jordan
description: Zip up and head out in this essential layer. Made from lightweight woven fabric, this jacket is the perfect grab-and-go for spring and summer.

title: Nike Sportswear
category: Women's Ribbed Jersey Long-Sleeve V-Neck Top
description: Move throughout your day in comfort and ease with stretchy ribbed fabric. The long, bell-shaped sleeves add style without restricting access (thanks to the interior slits).

title: Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Stadium Away
description: Our designers reached into the archives to design the Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Away shirt, drawing inspiration from a colour-blocked kit first released in '95. Digitised green graphics add a modern look, while a graphic on the inner pride pays tribute to the 97 people who tragically died in the Hillsborough Disaster. Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Tempo
description: Embrace your victories and let your inner goddess shine in these Tempo shorts. Incredibly lightweight, they give you comfortable coverage for your run. Smooth, woven fabric moves with every stride, wicking away sweat so you can run freely.

title: Nike Sportswear Everyday Modern
description: Keep it cool and crisp in these lightweight woven shorts. Extra room at the hip and thigh will keep you moving freely through your day.

title: Nike Dri-FIT ISoFly
description: Bring your focus, fierceness and fighting spirit to the basketball court in the Nike Dri-FIT ISoFly Basketball Shorts. They're designed for wider hips and legs and have an optimal inseam length. Lightweight fabric with sweat-wicking technology helps you stay comfortable.

title: Nike SB Tanglin
description: Made from tough cotton fabric with reinforced stitching, this short-sleeve woven top is durable enough for daily riding and comfortable enough to wear anywhere. The soft mid-weight fabric feels smooth yet structured enough to withstand the woes of learning and earning that new trick.

title: Nike Sportswear Premium Essentials
description: With room to move but not so much that it feels baggy, this relaxed-fit tee is perfect for when you're looking for a classic, comfortable feel. Organic cotton and a simple Swoosh make this top an essential you can count on every day of the year.

title: Nike SB
description: Made from soft French terry fleece for warmth and comfort, this Nike SB hoodie features our signature box logo front and centre. The skate-ready fit is roomy through the chest, shoulders and body for easy movement and layering. Skate hard, lounge easy.

title: FFF Essential
description: With an oversized design, the FFF Jacket goes on effortlessly over your other gear. Lightweight Ripstop fabric with a water-repellent finish helps you stay dry while you're repping your squad in wet weather, and a crest on the chest shows your devotion to the national team.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Arm day? Rest day? Get-stuff-done day? Stay comfortable no matter what kind of day it is in this spacious tunic. Its midweight French terry fabric (with unbrushed loops on the inside) gives structure, breathability and softness—so it's just as ready for the gym as it is for the sofa.

title: Nike Dri-FIT
description: With stretchy, ribbed fabric and sweat-wicking tech, this running top is ready for wherever your route takes you. A relaxed, cropped fit keeps you comfy and cool as the miles tick by.

title: Nike One Luxe
description: Above all else, you need flexibility in your routine and in what you wear to train. These lightweight shorts are the second skin you'll want to live in. Made from silky-soft fabric that you can't see through, they keep you confidently covered for any workout—and the rest of your day. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 Stadium Home
description: Packed with details, the Liverpool F.C. 2023/24 shirt remembers the 97 people who tragically died in the Hillsborough Disaster. A 97 set between two eternal flames resides on the inner pride, while white accents on the collar and sleeves nod to a shirt worn by the legendary '74 squad. Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Made from lightweight woven material, the Nike Sportswear Woven Trousers are perfect for seasonal wear. Designed with our Easy Jogger design, they feature a contrasting stripe design that gives you bold, street-ready style. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Dunk High
description: Designed for those who aren't afraid to express themselves, the Nike Dunk High returns with vibrant gradient colours to take your style sky high. Premium leather, plush ankle padding and an unmistakable silhouette help you bring a hoops-inspired design to the street. Are you ready to get creative with your look?

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom GP Turbo Osaka Premium
description: Tennis matches are fast, fierce and long. This version of Naomi Osaka's shoe combines a responsive Zoom Air unit with zones of durability, so you can stay fresh. Inspired by the Art Nouveau movement, this special look combines curving, flowing plant-like embellishments with Japanese motifs that celebrate Naomi's cultural roots and growing interest in both fine arts and organic gardening.

title: Nike Winflo 9
description: The Winflo 9 gives you the support you need to match your speed. It has a secure fit that helps keep your foot in place as the miles go by. We added plenty of foam through the midsole, giving you extra pep to every step. Lace up, lock in, win your goals.
colour: Dark Smoke Grey/Olive Grey/Metallic Copper/Metallic Silver

title: Nike Blazer Mid '77
description: Styled for the '70s. Loved in the '80s. Classic in the '90s. Ready for the future. The Nike Blazer Mid '77 delivers a timeless design that's easy to wear. Its unbelievably crisp leather upper gets broken in beautifully, and is paired with bold retro branding and luscious suede accents for a premium feel. Exposed foam on the tongue and a special midsole finish make it look like you've just pulled them from the history books. Go ahead, perfect your outfit.

title: Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer Next Nature
description: Paying homage to both heritage and innovation, the Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer goes beyond what's expected by blending an icon of the past with an icon of today. Incredibly light and stretchy Flyknit pairs with oh-so-soft cushioning for comfort you have to feel. Lace up and let your feet do the talking.

title: Nike Air Zoom Victory
description: Push for your personal best in the Nike Air Zoom Victory.Its design is built with the support and stability you need for a run from 800 to 5,000 metres.

title: Nike Cortez SE
description: The Cortez SE brings back an iconic athletics style with an after-dark update. Crafted with crisp leather and a herringbone outsole, it features the same design lines you know and love from the original. The glow-in-the-dark Swoosh logos make these special-edition sneakers come alive at night.

title: Nike Free Metcon 4 Premium
description: The Nike Free Metcon 4 Premium combines flexibility with stability to help you get the most out of your training programme. Updated "chain-link" mesh cools and flexes as you speed through agility drills, while support at the midfoot and heel braces you for your heaviest sets in the weight room.
colour: Purple Smoke/Dark Smoke Grey/Metallic Gold/Metallic Copper

title: Nike Air Max 97
description: Sleek. Stylish. Simple. The Air Max 97's water-inspired design flows whether you're out for a run or a night on the town. Full-length Nike Air cushioning lets you ride in performance comfort.

title: Nike Free Run 5.0
description: Made from at least 20% recycled material by weight, the sock-like boot of this Nike Free is designed to transition from running to training to your everyday routine. With a breathable knit upper, it combines the flexibility you love with a secure design that will help keep you close to the ground for that barefoot feeling. New cushioning is lighter, softer and more responsive than previous versions so you can keep moving in comfort whether you're on the tarmac or track.

title: Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer
description: Paying homage to both heritage and innovation, we've blended 2 icons (old and new) to go beyond what's expected in the Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer. Incredibly light and airy Flyknit is paired with oh-so-comfy Air Max cushioning. Lace up and let your feet do the talking.

title: Nike Rival Distance
description: With a lightweight, breathable upper and cushioned midsole, this adaptable spike dials you in for a wide range of middle- and long-distance races. It takes learnings from the game-changing Dragonfly spike to give you efficient energy return for the tough middle laps and top-end speed as you kick into the homestretch.

title: Air Jordan 1 Low OG
description: The Air Jordan 1 Low OG remakes the classic sneaker with new colours and textures. Premium materials and accents give fresh expression to an all-time favourite.

title: Nike Rival Sprint
description: Race out of the starting blocks and finish with a flurry in a spike designed with speed in mind. Its robust, reinforced yet lightweight upper provides the key containment necessary to attack the turns and straightaways around the oval. Feel the power and drive of the forefoot plate as you get up on your toes and hightail it towards the tape.

title: Nike SB Zoom Blazer Mid x Mason Silva
description: Self-portrait with a skate shoe. Transcending every artistic movement is the same elusive goal: to capture one's true essence. The Zoom Blazer Mid x Mason Silva does just that. A staple of the skate scene way before he won Skater of the Year in 2020, Mason's design encapsulates ... well, Mason. From his favourite skate shoe to the simple Orange Label aesthetic he loves, the design shines a light on Mason the skater. He even took pen in hand to draw the chain link branding and self-portrait on the insole. Intimate, complicated and ready to skate—now that's a piece of art.

title: Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer Next Nature
description: Paying homage to both heritage and innovation, we've blended 2 icons (old and new) to go beyond what's expected in the Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer. Incredibly light and stretchy Flyknit is paired with oh-so-soft cushioning. Lace up and let your feet do the talking.

title: Nike Dunk Low SE
description: Lace up and make your mark in Dunks with an after-dark update. A legend in the basketball world and an icon in skate culture, the Dunk Low has been a favourite for decades. Reflective design ink details make these special-edition sneakers come alive at night.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Lover XX Premium
description: The Nike Air Force 1 Lover XX Premium features a simple, slip-on silhouette with a stacked midsole, plush interior and leather upper for a premium look.

title: Nike Daybreak
description: Originally released in 1979, the Nike Daybreak is a blast from the past. Featuring the same rubber Waffle outsole, it gives you true vintage style.

title: Nike Air Force 1 '07 LX
description: Take your love for the game with you wherever you go. Crossing hardwood comfort with off-court flair, these kicks put a fresh spin on a hoops classic with washed-out neon colours and classic paisley print. Of course, we kept the same era-echoing '80s construction and hidden Nike Air units you know and love for that legendary AF-1 feel. Go ahead, slip into a slam dunk.

title: Nike Blazer Low Platform Canvas
description: Created for the hardwood but taken to the streets, the '80s b-ball icon returns with classic colours and throwback hoops flair. A slight platform gives you just the right amount of lift, while the canvas upper brings all the summer vibes.

title: Nike Air Force 1 '07 EasyOn
description: Quicker than 1, 2, 3—the original hoops shoe lets you step in and get going. Its EasyOn entry system gives you a hands-free experience, while crisp leather dons the cleanest colour for ultimate wearability. Yeah, it's everything you love and then some.

title: Nike Revolution 6 Premium
description: Set the pace at the start of your running journey with the plush feel of the Nike Revolution 6 Premium. We know comfort is key to a successful run, so we made sure your steps are cushioned and flexible for a soft ride. It's an evolution of a favourite, with a breathable design.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: More than perhaps any other silhouette, the Air More Uptempo encapsulates '90s basketball flavour at its finest. Big and loud, the unapologetic design represents a hybrid of style and innovation that made major waves when it debuted—and still turns heads today. Its neutral colourway keeps it easy to style, while visible Nike Air cushioning delivers the comfort you need to finish your off-court look.

title: Nike Metcon 8 Premium
description: You chase the clock, challenging and encouraging each other all in the name of achieving goals and making gains. Our go-to model for training relies on a lighter, more breathable upper than our previous iteration to complement our standards of durability and comfort, so that you can float through your cardio, power through your lifts and dominate your workouts.

title: Nike Air Max INTRLK Lite
description: You've got to feel the sensation to be the sensation. Enter the Nike Air Max INTRLK Lite. Rethought Air cushioning turns the page in comfort with increased responsiveness and the perfect amount of bounce. Lightweight, easy-to-style materials stand up to wear and tear. Finishing it off, the Waffle-inspired outsole adds true Nike zest.

title: Nike Pegasus Turbo Next Nature SE
description: Let this esteemed stallion help you log the hard miles. Complete with lighter, responsive foam and a feathery upper, this motley-coloured mare helps you increase tempo without sacrificing comfort as you push towards a personal best. Sharp, bright hues complement dark-room colour neutrals, speaking to an inclusive world where digital and physical coexist in harmony.

title: Nike React Infinity 3 Premium
description: Still 1 of our most tested shoes, made to help you stay after those lofty running goals. The Nike React Infinity Run 3 feels soft and stable, providing a smooth ride that will carry you through routes—both long and short. A breathable upper is made to feel contained, yet flexible. We even added more cushioning around the heel and ankle for a supportive sensation. Keep running in this special watercolour-like graphic, with floral pastels and subtle pinks and greens that capture the vibe of the summer season.

title: Nike Blazer Mid '77
description: Styled for the '70s. Loved in the '80s. Classic in the '90s. Ready for the future. The Blazer Mid delivers a timeless design with bold branding that's easy to wear. The era-echoing upper breaks in beautifully and pairs with an exposed foam tongue and a special midsole finish, making it look like you've just pulled them from the history books. Go ahead—perfect your outfit.

title: Nike Air Max Dawn
description: Rooted to athletics DNA, the Air Max Dawn is made from at least 20% recycled material by weight. Synthetic suede and textile materials blend vintage running vibes with fresh details. Nike Air cushioning delivers a feel-good forecast for the day.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Low Billie
description: We've teamed up with Billie again—this time to bring you a refreshing take on the Air Force 1. Crafting the wardrobe staple with a patchwork mosaic and adding in the versatility of a classic Triple White colourway, it delivers big on easy styling. The rethought upper and cork sockliner balance Billie's progressive and contemporary perspective with a heartfelt respect for the legendary shoe. The result—an unexpected and stylish twist on the AF-1 that's perfect for everyone.

title: Nike Dunk Low SE
description: April Fool's Day arrives with a special twist. inspired by the Vomero 5, the Dunk Low gets all dressed up in the coveted running shoe's layered design. Energetic pops of Blustery and Volt nod to an original Vomero 5 colourway, while the midfoot cage and reflective-design detailing add sporty complexity to the timeless hoops classic. A backdrop of grey tones make 'em an easy-to-style staple, finished with a fun split-graphic tongue label. No joke here—you're gonna look good.

title: Nike Metcon 8 Premium
description: You chase the clock, challenging and encouraging each other all in the name of achieving goals and making gains. Our go-to model for training relies on a lighter, more breathable upper than our previous edition to complement our standards of durability and comfort, so that you can float through your cardio, power through your lifts and dominate your workouts. A contemporary floral look creates a sense of renewal and growth on this laid-back summertime-vibe design.

title: Air Jordan 2 Retro
description: Making its debut in 1986, the AJ-2 was the cool younger sibling of its famous predecessor—a sleeker and more pared-down version of the iconic AJ-1. With premium nubuck leather and an Air-Sole unit underfoot, this throwback serves the ultimate combo of wearability and style.

title: Nike Air Max 1 Premium
description: Whish-whish—wish you had a pair? Well, don't wait too long. The Air Max 1 'Corduroy' is your entry ticket. Wrapped in the ultra-tough yet soft and versatile fabric, its wonderful texture showcases your contemplative, care-free mood. Blending the perfect amount of casual, Sunday-morning style with some quaint countryside flair, it punches straight through any "boring professor" misconceptions with ocean hues. Step on in and let 'em whisk you away.

title: Nike Dunk Low
description: Tulips, daffodils and Dunks! Indulge this spring with a garden-fresh bouquet. Awash in energetic pastels like Oxygen Purple, Electric Algae and Sundial, this Dunk Low lets your style bloom. Crisp leather delivers classic hoops-to-street style, and if that's not enough, the padded collar lets you take your game anywhere—in comfort.

title: Nike Air Force 1 PLT.AF.ORM LV8
description: You have to look closely at these unique kicks to find what makes us smile. With leather that ages to soft perfection, a sculpted collar and soft foam underfoot, the PLT.AF.ORM LV8 lets classic, easy-to-wear AF-1 style rise to new heights. Its elegantly shaped and lifted midsole delivers a proud, fresh look to the hoops franchise while pops of colour and subtle smiley face details keep your every step happy.

title: Nike Moc Flow x UNDERCOVER
description: UNDERCOVER's Jun Takahashi redefines simplicity with the Moc Flow. Pairing the innovative midsole/outsole of the ISPA Flow with the subtle and comfy design of the ACG Moc, Takahashi creates a new experience. Premium leather ages to perfection, while the cord lacing system with a toggle lock lets you customise your fit on the go.

title: Jordan Delta 3 Low SE
description: High-end craft, good looks, sublime comfort? These are the everyday kicks you've been waiting for. Inspired by how a lotus (the red, durable combination upper) grows from mud (the soft foam midsole), the design tells a story worth repeating. Made from airy Ripstop and soft suede, you get a smooth interior with superior support.

title: Nike SB Zoom Blazer Mid Premium
description: The Nike SB Zoom Blazer Mid is an iconic hoops shoe tailored to the needs of the modern skateboarder. Durable, premium suede is paired with tacky rubber for flexible grip and comfort that lasts. Snappy and responsive, Zoom Air cushioning helps provide a quick-off-the-ground sensation.

title: Nike ISPA Sense Flyknit
description: Breathe in. Breathe out. The ISPA Sense is your ticket to tranquillity. Mixing sustainable materials (it's made from at least 20% recycled content by weight) with meditative comfort, the design pulls inspiration from Zen gardens. The stretchy, bootie-like upper with an airy Flyknit design integrates venting and padding for extra on-foot bliss. Tie it all together with the sleek lacing system and then stay upright with added traction on the outsole. Do good, look good, and overcome the urban environment's most challenging obstacles with this fresh design that gives new meaning to rest and relaxation.

title: Nike Air Max 1 Premium
description: Get away and immerse yourself. The Air Max 1 "Escape" pairs classic running DNA with Pacific Northwest-inspired details. The striking colours were pulled from an iconic Nike running ad—one that featured Mount St. Helens' caldera billowing in the background. An embroidered forest scene on the heel is worthy of wanderlust. And the rugged suede accents, airy textile and boot-inspired laces finish your look. Time to escape.

title: Nike Air Max 1 '86 Premium
description: Lost and found. The thrill of the hunt. Open the vault. Better than that—this Air Max 1 brings to life one of Tinker Hatfield's early drawings of the icon. Using details from a long-lost notebook to make "what if" a reality, the design brings history into the here and now with its aged midsole and worn aesthetic on the leather overlays. The coveted safari print on the mudguard and a "hand drawn" graphic above the Air unit round off the story of pulling pages from the history books.
colour: Light Smoke Grey/Indigo Haze/Diffused Blue/Diffused Blue

title: Nike J Force 1 Low LX SP
description: Inspired by traditional crafting and a desire to reintroduce the human element into shoe construction, Nike and Jacquemus created the J Force 1. Notes were taken from Nike Considered, the early-2000s project known for using minimal glue as a means to lessen the environmental impact of footwear production. All of this hypothetical influence resulted in a shoe that looks equally at home in an art museum as it does in the outside world.

title: Nike TC 7900
description: Mixed materials and a hidden graphic on the insole have you stepping fresh into new adventures. Webbing details and rubber accents on the heel add to the rugged look. But don't worry about the ride—an exaggerated midsole and soft foam cushioning underfoot help keep you comfortable all day.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Low Retro
description: A scorching edition to your AF-1 collection, this head-turning take on the hoops-to-street icon brings the heat. Contrasting colours add a bold look to any outfit, while Nike Air cushioning puts the cherry on the bottom.

title: Nike Air Max Koko
description: Heat up the streets in the Air Max Koko. Thanks to the chunky platform design and visible Nike Air cushioning, you get both the casual look of sandals with the comfortable feel of sneakers. Time to elevate your look, literally.

title: Nike Air Max Dawn
description: Rooted to sporty athletics DNA, the Air Max Dawn is thoughtfully crafted with Air cushioning to deliver a feel-good forecast for your day. Soft synthetic suede and airy textile blend vintage running vibes with modern design. The plush foam in the midsole slants at the heel for added energy while the outsole pattern gives your style traction.

title: Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer
description: Flyknit to the (Air) Max. This shoe pays homage to the 2012 Flyknit Racer, with the added innovation of Nike Air Max technology. The near-seamless upper is featherweight and form-fitting, and the chiselled heel and Max Air window add to the mix of heritage and innovation.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom NXT
description: Get the most out of every step in the NikeCourt Air Zoom NXT. Using insights from our top athletes, we added a large Zoom Air unit for extra bounce and spring when you push off to serve. After removing as much weight as we could without sacrificing durability, we also made sure this incredibly lightweight design was extremely comfortable. Thanks to a plush collar and a more linear, angular-shaped mesh and finish, you get the cushioned feel you love so you can focus on playing at your best.

title: Nike Victori One Osaka
description: From the beach to the stands, the Nike Victori One perfects a classic must-have for sunny days. Lightweight and easy to wear (or pack for your holiday), the soft, responsive foam makes lounging easy. This special print, inspired by Japanese cherry blossoms, brings spring into full bloom.

title: Nike SB Pogo
description: Skate in comfort with the Nike SB Pogo. It delivers a broken-in fit straight out of the box. Its canvas and leather upper ages to perfection. And the raised taping increases control for the perfect flick.

title: Nike Dunk High
description: Created for the hardwood but taken to the streets, the '80s b-ball icon returns with crisp leather and retro colours. The classic hoops design channels '80s vintage back onto the streets while the padded, high-top collar adds an old-school look rooted in comfort.

title: Nike Asuna 2
description: Want to transition effortlessly between worlds? Built to feel good all day, this plush slide uses a rugged tread pattern for traction on a variety of surfaces. Step in, cinch it closed and get going.

title: Nike Dunk High x SOULGOODS
description: Partnering with Beijing-based brand SOULGOODS, we're bringing you a "What If?" pack that looks at the icon through mainland China's basketball community from the past three decades. The big question: what would Chinese state basketball shoes have looked like in the 1990s? For this release, we've chosen a classic pair of Dunks to showcase China's thriving music scene. The olive and black tones paired with a stacked Swoosh are inspired by local rock album covers, while the butter-like leather and embroidered tiger take cues from East Coast hip-hop musicians. It's safe to say the Dunk High x SOULGOODS proves no details are overlooked.

title: Nike Dunk Low Disrupt 2
description: Re-imagining the hoops icon through a lens of self-expression, the Dunk Low Disrupt 2 bridges tried-and-tested style with a customisable design. Double eyestays pair with an offset bottom eyelet (and an extra set of laces) for a unique twist that lets you personalise your look, while its playful layering and rich textures energise every step.

title: NikeCourt Legacy Canvas Mid
description: Honouring its history rooted in tennis culture, the NikeCourt Legacy Canvas Mid lifts the classic to new heights.It's made from durable canvas, heritage stitching and has a large Swoosh on the side to help freshen up the rotation.The padded collar feels great and adds an extra layer of comfort.

title: Nike Dunk Low Twist
description: The '80s b-ball icon returns with classic details and throwback hoops flair. Channelling vintage style back onto the streets, its padded collar and extra-puffy silhouette let you take your game anywhere—in comfort.

title: Nike Pegasus 40 Premium
description: A springy ride for any run, the Peg's familiar, just-for-you feel returns to help you accomplish your goals. This version has the same responsiveness and neutral support you love but with improved comfort in those sensitive areas of your foot, like the arch and toes. Whether you're logging long marathon miles, squeezing in a speed session before the sun goes down or hopping into a spontaneous group jaunt, it's still the established road runner you can put your faith in, day after day, run after run. This special watercolour-like print, with floral pastels and subtle pinks and greens, captures the vibe of the summer season.

title: Nike Offcourt Adjust
description: Post-game, errands and more—adjust your comfort on the go. The adjustable, padded strap lets you perfect your fit, while the lightweight foam midsole brings first-class comfort to your feet.

title: Nike Zegama
description: Navigate the up and downs of uncompromising terrain with the Nike Zegama. Developed with great grip and stability, it has you covered, so you can keep climbing and reach greater personal heights when the going gets grimy and gritty. Whether it's a challenging, rocky landscape going uphill or a steep, slick decline down a treacherous trail, feel confident when you decide to off-road it.

title: Nike Zoom SuperRep 4 Next Nature
description: The quad-burning box jumps that bring your "why" into focus. The sweat-soaked super-sets that leave you bent over double. This is what you live for: the struggle, the moment of truth, the breakthrough, the transformation. Designed for quick bursts of force, heart-thumping tempo changes and fast-paced workouts, this shoe helps push you to fresh HIIT heights.

title: NikeCourt Legacy
description: Honouring a history rooted in tennis culture, the NikeCourt Legacy Mule reinvents a classic with an easy-on design and comfy foam insole.Made from durable canvas and featuring heritage stitching and retro Swoosh design, it lets you blend sport and fashion.

title: Nike Pegasus Turbo
description: Let this esteemed stallion help you log the hard miles. Complete with lighter, responsive, repurposed foam and a feather upper, this motley-coloured mare is made to help you increase tempo without sacrificing comfort as you push towards a personal best. This immortal is responsibly constructed with at least 50% recycled material by weight, while maintaining its tried-and-tested everyday ethos.

title: Nike Air Max SYSTM
description: Looks Max, feels Max. The Air Max SYSTM brings back everything you love about your favourite '80s vibes (without the parachute trousers). Tried-and-tested cushioning is paired with a sleek, sport-inspired upper. It's Air Max delivering again.

title: Nike Zoom Bella 6 Premium
description: Unleash your innermost strength and spirit in the Nike Zoom Bella 6 Premium. This design supports heavy lifts, explosive movements and primal post-set struts as you flaunt your hard-earned progress on the gym floor. Newly implemented Zoom Air cushioning gives you pop, and an updated forefoot ensures all sorts of foot shapes can flex through their workouts in true style.

title: Nike Cortez
description: One word: tradition. From heritage running to fashion phenom, its retro appeal, sponge-soft midsole and see-saw detailing deliver decade after decade. This iteration offers easy-to-style colours with a vintage vibe.

title: Nike Air Max 1 Premium
description: We saw how you all voted in our "CO.JP Tournament" and decided to make an Air Max 1 that combines elements from the top 8 winning shoes. Yes, it sounds messy but we think the result is pretty pristine. You can probably tell where the colourways came from. And we bet you can easily place the crocodile texture, as well as that snake print in the Swoosh. What about the other winners—can you tell how we worked them in?

title: NOCTA
description: Made from premium, water-repellent woven fabric, this long-sleeve NOCTA crew helps you stay dry, day or night. The mesh-lined, vented back with magnetic closure lets the breeze in and your body heat out to keep you cool when things heat up.

title: Nike AeroSwift
description: Innovative technology combines with lightweight materials to help you strive for your best finish yet. The Nike AeroSwift Shorts are all about speed, with a smooth feel and slim fit that helps you move freely.

title: Air Jordan 1 Low OG
description: Step into greatness with the Air Jordan 1 Low OG.Updated colour and texture gives the all-time favourite a fresh identity while staying true to the original design.

title: Nike Pegasus FlyEase SE
category: Women's Easy On/Off Road Running Shoes
description: Let the Pegasus FlyEase help you ascend to new heights. Designed to offer a balanced and energised ride for every run, they provide a supportive sensation that helps your foot feel contained. Plus, Nike FlyEase technology acts as a strap, helping secure your fit and making these easy to get on and off. Zoom Air units in the forefoot and heel help add a pop to your stride as you transition from heel to toe. Sharp, bright hues complement dark-room-colour neutrals, speaking to an inclusive world where digital and physical coexist in harmony.

title: Nike SB Bruin High
description: No matter where you are, the Bruin High lets you make things happen. As the first Nike SB shoe designed specifically for a snug fit, it delivers more comfort and better board control for narrower feet. So hit the skateparks and streets and let your style impress.
colour: Medium Soft Pink/Medium Soft Pink/Summit White/Black

title: Jordan Brooklyn Fleece
description: Bring some sporty mobility to your everyday ensemble. These relaxed shorts feature loopback fleece for lightweight softness, while the elastic drawcord waistband gives you stretch and structure for all-day wear.

title: Nike Air Max 1 '87
description: Captivating and thumping with bold prints and textures, the Air Max 1 '87 is the statement piece every 'fit needs. Inspired by what the hottest sneaker boutique would look like, we've upped the opulence with warm earth tones and unexpected patterns that nod to sophisticated upholstery and area rugs. From velvety laces to a silky black liner and icy blue outsole, these kicks take decor dominance to a brand-new level. Ready to hang?

title: Nike Blazer Mid '77 Canvas
description: Styled for the '70s. Loved in the '80s. Classic in the '90s. Ready for the future. The Blazer Mid '77 delivers a timeless design in monochromatic canvas and synthetic leather that's easy to style and easier to wear. Its era-echoing upper breaks in beautifully and is paired with retro branding for a premium feel. This look is one for the history books.

title: Nike One
description: Push yourself to crush your goals in these leggings that just won't quit. Perfect for any workout—or any time—the high-rise waistband pairs with sweat-wicking fabric to help keep you supported and dry. Non-sheer fabric passes the squat test so you can feel confident knowing you're covered no matter what. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Academy
description: Heading to early-morning training or warming up before the match? This breathable short-sleeve top is designed with tech to help keep you comfortable and dry as you work up a sweat. With mesh panels down the sides and on the outer sleeves, you can stay cool however you choose to play.

title: Jordan Brooklyn Fleece
description: Working out or working from home—you're perfectly suited for whatever in these soft, brushed fleece shorts. Slide 'em on, tighten 'em and own your day.

title: Nike One Luxe
description: Above all else, you need flexibility in your routine and in what you wear to train. These lightweight leggings are the second skin you'll want to live in. Made from silky-soft fabric that you can't see through, they keep you confidently covered for any workout—and the rest of your day. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Essentials
description: A classic tee with a classic fit. It's made from jersey fabric with just the right amount of stretch—giving you a wardrobe staple you can reach for again and again.

title: Nike Sportswear Tech Pack
description: Dive into your summer in this lightweight, stretchy bodysuit. Dress it up, dress it down or take it for a swim—its advanced sweat-wicking design will help keep you cool and gives you plenty of styling options in scorching temps.

title: Malaysia 2022/24 Stadium Away
description: Like other shirts from our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking fabric to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Alate Ellipse
category: Women's Medium-Support Padded Longline Sports Bra
description: Feel confident all day long in this medium-support Alate bra. A sewn-in 1-piece pad and longline silhouette offer enhanced coverage and shaping while sweat-wicking technology keeps you cool and comfortable. The InfinaSoft fabric of the body and straps feels like you're being hugged by a silky cloud and stretches easily, giving you the ultimate freedom of movement. You might just forget you're wearing a bra at all.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh
description: Keep dry and moving freely during your run in this stretchy, cropped tank. Sweat-wicking tech and an open racerback help you worry less about sweat and focus on your route.

title: Nike Universa
category: Women's Medium-Support High-Waisted 20cm (approx.) Biker Shorts with Pockets
description: Our Nike Universa shorts help smooth and lift, stretching freely with your every move. Wherever your workout takes you, their squat-proof, mid-weight InfinaSmooth fabric gives you uncompromising comfort and feels cool and sleek to the touch. Plus, they're durable enough for you to flex, wash and wear again and again. They're the pair you'll reach for whether you need something for your everyday run, everyday training or just every day.

title: Nike Fast
category: Women's Mid-Rise 7/8 Gradient-Dye Running Leggings with Pockets
description: Make your miles count in these leggings with sweat-wicking technology and stretchy fabric. Supportive without pinching or binding, a wide waistband with a drawcord offers a comfortable feel on the go, while convenient pockets help you keep your essentials close.

title: Nike Sportswear Classics
description: More durable, less sheer and designed to be twice as stretchy as our previous Essentials leggings: we've revamped a wardrobe staple. Designed to support you from one task to the next, our Classics lifestyle leggings are made from stretchy fabric that's thick but still lightweight and peachy-soft but strong. In two words, they're better.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh
description: Whether you're pounding the pavement or just cruising, this top was designed to feel comfortable no matter how you choose to move. No need to check your eyes, the double Swoosh graphic mimics movement to inspire you to keep going.

title: Nike Air Fast
category: Women's Mid-Rise 7/8 Running Leggings with Pockets
description: Keep running with the sweat-wicking support of these leggings. Mesh panels on the back of the knees give cool ventilation mile after mile. Plus, multiple pockets keep all of your small running essentials at your fingertips. Part of the Nike Air collection, they feature colours and graphics inspired by our branding from the early 2000s.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Victory
description: We took your favourite polo and gave it a feel-good update. The Nike Dri-FIT Victory Polo is crafted from lightweight, breathable fabric that's made with 100% recycled polyester fibres. This otherwise-classic design has a slightly longer, 4-button placket that keeps your look fresh.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Wrap yourself in comfortable organic cotton. Made with slightly dropped shoulders, the loose fit brings a relaxed, casual feel.

title: Nike Pro 365
description: The Nike Pro 365 Shorts wrap you in stretchy fabric featuring Dri-FIT Technology, to keep you feeling supported and dry during intense workouts. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Club Fleece
description: Club Fleece sweatshirts, universally loved for their cosiness and consistency, are for everyone. Always soft and made with a relaxed fit, they're basics that help you do more. This full-zip option allows you to regulate your temp on the fly. Zip it up when the wind is howling or leave it open to show off your favourite tees and tops.

title: Naomi Osaka
description: Express your inner vibrant inner self in this lightweight, easy-fitting top. Unveiling Naomi's story and Japanese roots, the shy, muted colours bloom into a bold floral print. A full-length snap placket lets you change up your style and make it your own—just like Naomi would.

title: Paris Saint-Germain 2022/23 Stadium Third
description: Like other shirts from our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking fabric to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Jordan Brooklyn
description: Everyone needs a cosy hoodie that pulls on easy and goes with anything. This one ticks all the boxes. It's made from soft loopback fleece in an intentionally roomy fit, complete with an oversized Jumpman logo so everyone knows who you're reppin'.

title: Nike Pro Dri-FIT
description: Move through your training routine with confidence in this cropped tank top. Its sweat-wicking, stretchy fabric supports you through every movement.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Keep your style humming with this classic, easy tee. With a relaxed fit and soft cotton fabric, it's an effortless option that's always cool and comfortable.

title: Nike One
description: Push yourself to crush your goals in these leggings that just won't quit. Perfect for any workout—or any time—the high-rise waistband pairs with sweat-wicking fabric to help keep you supported and dry. Non-sheer fabric passes the squat test so you can feel confident knowing you're covered no matter what. This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike ACG Dri-FIT 'New Sands'
description: Get out and collect some memories in these stretchy, lightweight trousers. Made from quick-drying fabric, they're perfect for moderate-to-cool conditions. Layer them over a base layer for added warmth in colder temperatures. Plenty of pockets keep your essentials close and easy to grab when you're on the trail.

title: USA
description: Keep your tee game fresh and your loyalty to USA front and centre. Made from midweight cotton fabric that's soft with a slight drape, this everyday T-shirt celebrates your favourite squad with a casual look and feel.

title: England Essential
description: With an oversized design, the England Jacket goes on effortlessly over your other gear. Lightweight Ripstop fabric with a water-repellent finish helps you stay dry while you're repping your squad in wet weather, and a crest on the chest shows your devotion to the national team.

title: Jordan
description: Punch up the traditional collegiate look with this super-cropped tee. Block lettering inspired by the classic varsity jacket gives depth and texture, while the unique cut is perfect for layering (or not).

title: Nike Dri-FIT Victory
description: We took your favourite polo and gave it a feel-good update. The Nike Dri-FIT Victory Polo is crafted from lightweight, breathable fabric that's made with 100% recycled polyester fibres. Its classic design has a slightly longer, 4-button placket that keeps your look fresh.

title: FFF 2023 Stadium Home
description: It only takes a glance to know who this kit belongs to. The iconic powder blue colour celebrates the early pioneers of women's football in France. A tricolour pattern on the sleeves and scripted logo hidden on the inside infuses the FFF 2023 Home shirt with national DNA. Like other jerseys in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by Les Bleues.

title: Australia Essential
description: With an oversized design, the Australia Jacket goes on effortlessly over your other gear. Lightweight Ripstop fabric with a water-repellent finish helps you stay dry while you're repping your team in wet weather.

title: Nike Sportswear Circa 96
description: Take it back to basketball in '96—the shorts were baggier, the jerseys were longer and the WNBA was about to change the game forever. Plenty of room in the legs and soft satin fabric make these trousers an easy choice. Use the breakaway snaps on the sides to change up your look with ease.

title: Jordan Brooklyn Fleece
description: Who doesn't love a pair of classic tracksuit bottoms? Feel amazing in joggers that have just enough heft to keep you at the perfect temperature while you remind everyone why they should grab a pair too.

title: Nike ACG Storm-FIT "Cascade Rains"
description: Open your pack and grab this lightweight, waterproof jacket when wind and rain make their way into your adventure. Cinch the hood and hem to keep the storm out and your focus on fun. When the storm calls it quits, pack the jacket into its own pocket and throw it in your bag for the next round.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
category: Women's High-Waisted Full-Length Open-Hem French Terry Tracksuit Bottoms
description: Whether you're warming up, slinging weights or just lounging on your rest day, stay comfortable in these easy-fitting, sweat-wicking trousers made for your everyday moves. Their midweight French terry fabric (with unbrushed loops on the inside) gives structure, breathability and softness—so they're just as ready for the gym as they are for the sofa. A wide-leg design lets you layer up or keep things airy.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential
description: As comfy and easy to throw on as your favourite tee, this dress is ready for whatever you are. A curved hem and a flowy, oversized fit add a chic twist to a wardrobe staple.

title: Nike Zenvy (M)
description: Whether it's yoga, a bike ride or a walk, you can move freely in our unbelievably soft Nike Zenvy leggings. Their InfinaSoft fabric is lightweight—but still squat-proof!—with softness that you can feel with every bend, stretch and shift. Fewer pockets give you a streamlined look, but the drop-in pocket in the middle of the back is still big enough to hold your phone. As your body changes, the maternity design gives you extra space where you need it so it adapts throughout your pregnancy. Plus, they're durable enough for you to move, wash and wear again and again.

title: Nike One (M)
description: The Nike One Maternity Shorts are super versatile for any workout—or any time. The comfortable design wicks sweat to help keep you dry. Plus, you can't see through the fabric, so you can feel confident knowing you're covered. As your body changes, the maternity design gives you extra space where you need it so it adapts throughout your pregnancy. This product is made from at least 75% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Everyday Modern
category: Women's Oversized Crop French Terry Crew-neck Sweatshirt
description: Pull on this lightweight French terry sweatshirt on days when you want the comfort of fleece without too much warmth. Smooth on the outside with unbrushed loops on the inside, its midweight French terry helps create breathability, so it's comfy enough for you to wear all year. Extra room in the sleeves and body helps the fabric fold and gather for a relaxed look.

title: F.C. Barcelona 2023/24 Stadium Home
description: The F.C. Barcelona 2023/24 Home kit honours the 30-year journey of the Women's squad being incorporated into the club. The crest has a hidden diamond shape that was historically used by the Women's team, and the classic stripes have a diamond pattern along the edges. Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: NikeCourt Dri-FIT Slam
description: Own the court in this sweat-wicking skirt. 2 layers of pleats flow and flare with you as you move, while the inner shorts add support. A soft mesh waistband sits snugly above your hips without pinching or binding.

title: Nike ACG
description: Loose, roomy, outdoor ready. The Nike ACG T-Shirt keeps things comfy for the journey. This product is made from 100% sustainable materials, using a blend of both recycled polyester and organic cotton fibres. The blend is at least 10% recycled fibres or at least 10% organic cotton fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear Repel
description: Dive into sunny days in the Nike Sportswear Repel Shorts. Made from water-repellent, mesh-lined fabric, they're a comfy, breathable option for all your favourite warm-weather activities.

title: Nike Air
description: Keep your cool in this easy-fitting miniskirt. Its tall elastic waistband provides a snug, stay-put fit.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh
category: Women's 1/4-Zip Long-Sleeve Running Mid Layer (Plus Size)
description: Step forth on your running journey in this mid layer. It's got a soft feel with a 1/4-zip design so you can control your airflow. Thumbholes on the sleeves help cover your hands when the chill hits.

title: Nike Alate (M)
category: Women's Light-Support Lightly Lined Sports Bra (Maternity)
description: You don't have to choose between being a mother and an athlete. The Alate (M) sports bra is designed with discreet layers to make timeouts for feeding or pumping a bit easier, with a special moisture-managing fabric and one-handed clips that provide easy access for nursing. Brushed fabric provides a cosy hand-feel for sensitive skin and is combined with a lightweight spacer lining that feels incredibly breathable while still giving you a little coverage.

title: Jordan Sport
description: Lessons we all learnt from MJ: hoop with your gold chains on, and make sure your gear is as strong as your crossover. Designed for sport as much as they are for style, these shorts feature a 15cm (approx.) inseam, breathable mesh with sweat-wicking tech and a rollable waistband with an internal drawcord.
colour: Sky J Teal/Citron Tint/Midnight Spruce/Citron Tint

title: Nike Air
description: Roomier than our classic tees, this loose-fit tee feels casual and comfortable without feeling too big.

title: Jordan Sport Essentials
description: With a cropped length, roomy fit and thoughtful details, this tank top is about to become your favourite wardrobe staple. Designed with MJ's workout cut-offs in mind, rolled hems accentuate the oversized arm holes and give the look some edge. Splits at both sides give you extra room to move and breathe, and sweat-wicking fabric keeps you dry.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Bliss
description: Find your bliss in these lightweight, moisture-wicking trousers. The wide, stretchy waistband offers support while sleek, featherweight fabric—with plenty of stretch—flows with you so you can move without boundaries. Tapered legs with ribbed cuffs help keep these relaxed joggers in place no matter how you move.

title: Nike Sportswear Storm-FIT ADV Tech Pack
description: Your shelter in a storm, this unlined trench coat uses advanced technology to help protect you from cold, wet weather. Long enough to keep you and your outfit covered, and with multiple snap points that allow you to customise your look, the design helps you adjust to changing temperatures and conditions on the fly.

title: Nike SB
description: Flow through your next skate sesh in comfort with this striped Nike SB tee. It's made from soft, midweight cotton in a casual, roomy fit to keep you feeling your best on and off your board.

title: Jordan Sport
description: Breeze through your workouts in this lightweight mesh tank top. Loose fitting with a hem that falls below the waist, it's designed to let you move freely. And check out the panel on the back—its Diamond shape recalls one of Jordan's most iconic designs.

title: Nike Dri-FIT (M)
description: The Nike Dri-FIT Maternity T-Shirt is made from extra-soft and sweat-wicking fabric to help keep you dry and comfortable. As your body changes throughout your pregnancy, the roomy cut gives you extra space where you need it most.

title: Nike Air
category: Women's Mid-Rise 7/8 Running Leggings with Pockets
description: Move like air in these smooth, stretchy leggings. Sweat-wicking tech is combined with mesh panels behind the knees to help keep the air flowing from start to finish, and plenty of pockets—on the thighs and in the waistband—let you keep your essentials close.

title: US Essential
description: With an oversized design, the US Jacket goes on effortlessly over your other gear. Lightweight Ripstop fabric with a water-repellent finish helps you stay dry while you're repping your team in wet weather.

title: Jordan
description: Buttoned up or buttoned down, this cropped polo takes you from the links to the streets with style. A slim cut and ribbed fabric add easy movement and breathability.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Run Division
description: Set your own pace in this easy-fitting top. Crafted from a lightweight wool blend that helps keep you cool and dry in warm weather, it's great worn on its own or layered on brisk mornings.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One Swoosh
description: Throw it back to those secondary school athletics days in this Nike One top. Soft, smooth fabric comes in a breathable silhouette to keep you cool and dry from start to finish.

title: Nike Sportswear Essential Repel
description: The Nike Sportswear Essential Repel Jacket is made from smooth, water-repellent fabric to help keep you dry and comfortable in cool, wet weather. Elasticated cuffs hold the sleeves in place while exposed bungees at the hem let you customise the style and fit. This product is made from 100% recycled polyester fibres.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Made from soft cotton, this roomy tee provides a comfortable, casual feel that looks as good as it feels.

title: USWNT (4-Star) 2023 Stadium Home
description: Like a piece of abstract art, the design of the USWNT 2023 Home shirt is more than meets the eye. Its paint-splatter graphic allows each jersey pattern to be unique, celebrating the individuals who, together, create order among the chaos of the game. Gold accents throughout are paired with hidden details to commemorate the team's unrivalled 4 world championships. Like the other shirts in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Stars and Stripes.

title: Nike ACG Dri-FIT ADV
description: Made to wear solo or layered for the elements, this foundational top feels like soft cotton but performs like a synthetic material. Nike Dri-FIT ADV technology combines moisture-wicking fabric with advanced engineering and features to help you stay dry and comfortable.

title: Nike Sportswear Modern Fleece
description: Sash-ay and flow through the day in this redefined romper. Its roomy design and sash belt gives you the freedom to make moves how you see fit, while the fabric's slightly crinkled texture has an elevated feel you can dress up or down.

title: England 2023 Stadium Home
description: With a white and blue colourway, the England 2023 Home shirt nods to the national team's impassioned attempt to capture a championship in '84. A graffiti-inspired accent on the sleeves is paired with a deconstructed England graphic hidden inside to give this throwback design a modern feel. Like other shirts in our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by the Lionesses

title: Nike Fly
description: From free throws to 3-pointers, dare to defy gravity in these relaxed, printed crossover shorts. Plenty of room in the legs and hips allows you to move freely on the court. With lightweight, cooling mesh and moisture-wicking tech, you won't have to worry about sweat while you and your team chase your hoop dreams.

title: Nike Sportswear Swoosh
description: Get lost in the stars as you kick back in this soft tee. Its relaxed fit will keep you comfy day and night.

title: Paris Saint-Germain 2023/24 Stadium Home
description: The inspiration for the PSG 2023/24 Home kit comes from La Ville Lumiere (City of Light). The mostly blue shirt has an off-centre red graphic fading to blue, mimicking the way the iconic lights of Paris fade into the night sky. The inner pride features the team name, while the outer pride features the French flag. Our Stadium collection pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking technology to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: Nike Sportswear
description: Get comfortable in collegiate style—complete with varsity patch-inspired graphics to help launch you into first pick.

title: Nike Dri-FIT Swoosh Run
description: Layer up and go for your miles in this Swoosh Run jacket. It's got a soft feel and slash pockets to help keep the garment lightweight. With sweat-wicking fabric and a full-length zip, you'll stay cool and comfortable as you run. Extra room in the sleeves and body makes layering easy.

title: Nike Air Zoom Infinity Tour NEXT%
description: We listened to the feedback you had on the Infinity Tour, refined it and brought it to life on the Nike Air Zoom Infinity Tour NEXT%. We increased the overall volume to give your foot more room, put an extra Zoom Air unit in the forefoot for even more energy transfer through your swing and added more traction in key areas to help reduce slipping. The result is an incredibly responsive, comfortable shoe that we know you're going to love.

title: Nike Dri-FIT One
description: Light and breezy, this top delivers a perfect counterpart to your miles. With sweat-wicking fabric and an easy fit, you'll stay cool as your run heats up.

title: Nike Renew In-Season TR 13 Premium
description: When time is of the essence, but your workout can't wait any longer, ride with the Nike In-Season TR 13. It offers versatility, the kind that can carry you from a hard-hitting HIIT class to the treadmill and turn a squeezed-in gym session into sweat-soaked satisfaction. Whether you're moving laterally or deepening your cardio base by reeling in a few miles in front of you, the energy return will help you reap what you sow. A contemporary floral look creates a sense of renewal and growth on this laid-back summertime-vibe design.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: Keeping the exaggerated, graffiti-styled "AIR" graphics and the Nike Air cushioning you love from the original, your favourite hoops look gets transformed into an easy, slip-on design. Pairing '90s style with summertime comfort, its plush strap and soft foam make it a perfect choice—courtside, beachside and anywhere in between.

title: England 2022/23 Stadium Home
description: Like other shirts from our Stadium collection, this one pairs replica design details with sweat-wicking fabric to give you a game-ready look inspired by your favourite team.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom GP Turbo Osaka
description: Tennis matches are fast, fierce and long. This version of Naomi Osaka's shoe combines a responsive Zoom Air unit with zones of durability to help you stay fresh longer. After removing as much weight as we could without sacrificing durability, we also made sure this lightweight design was very comfortable. Thanks to a plush collar and breathable mesh, you get the cool, cushioned feel you love so you can focus on playing at your best.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom Vapor 11
description: Validated by the greats of the game, the Vapor 11 is back and better than ever. Lower to the court and loaded with speed components, it helps you play at a fast pace with enough support to keep you bobbing and weaving for sets on end. Mainstays like the ultra-trusted moulded sidewall and breathable upper complement a durable, quick-moving design that you've come to know and love.

title: Nike Legend Essential 3 Next Nature Premium
description: Meet the trainer versatile enough to withstand the rigours of a fast-paced group class or a heavy day in the weight room. It's equipped with a flat heel, high-abrasion materials and a flexible sole—providing 360-degree comfort and support that's ready to hit any gym, any time. A contemporary floral look creates a sense of renewal and growth on this special summertime-vibe design.

title: Nike Victori One
description: From the beach to the stands, the Victori One is a must-have slide for everyday activities. Subtle yet substantial updates like a wider strap and softer foam make lounging easy. Go ahead—enjoy endless comfort for your feet.

title: Nike Revolution 6 Next Nature
description: Start your running journey with bold energy and immediate comfort in the Nike Revolution 6 Next Nature. We know comfort is key to a successful run—that's why we designed these with a breathable upper and foam that helps provide a soft, plush ride. Inspired by the vibrancy of Mexico City, we added a Bright Pink colourway and geometric graphics to infuse your run with fresh energy.

title: Nike Air Max 90
description: Lace up and feel the legacy. Produced at the cross section of art, music and culture, this champion running shoe helped define the '90s. Worn by presidents, revolutionised through collabs and celebrated through rare colourways, its striking visuals, Waffle outsole and exposed Air cushioning keep it alive and well.

title: Nike Legend Essential 3 Next Nature
description: Meet the trainer that can withstand the rigours of a fast-paced group class and a heavy day in the weight room. Equipped with a flat heel, durable materials and a flexible sole, it provides comfort and support that's ready to hit any gym, any time.

title: Nike SB Zoom Blazer Mid Premium
description: The Zoom Blazer Mid is an iconic hoops shoe tailored to the needs of the modern skateboarder. Textured suede creates a premium yet durable feel, while tacky rubber adds flexible grip and comfort that lasts.

title: NikeCourt Zoom NXT
description: Get the most out of every step in the NikeCourt Zoom NXT. Using insights from our top athletes, we added forefoot cushioning for extra spring when you push off to serve. After removing as much weight as we could without sacrificing durability, we also made sure this incredibly lightweight design was extremely comfortable. Thanks to a plush collar and breathable fabric, you'll get the cool, cushioned feel you love so you can focus on playing at your best.

title: ACG Air Deschutz+
description: From city hikes to canyon trails and long walks on the beach, the Nike ACG Air Deschutz + is built to get you places. Its classic '90s look is paired with a rugged, outdoor-inspired design made from quick-drying materials and plush cushioning. Strap in and let the elements of nature shape your character.

title: Nike Air Max Plus
description: Let your attitude have the edge in the Nike Air Max Plus, a tuned Air experience that offers premium stability and unbelievable cushioning. Featuring airy mesh, the original wavy design lines and polished TPU accents on the toe and sides, it celebrates your defiant style.

title: Nike Air Penny 2 x Stüssy
description: For Penny devotees and those just looking to refresh their off-court game, we've teamed up with Stüssy to bring you the slick assist your outfit needs. Echoing Stüssy's coveted style, it brings the magic with a premium hemp canvas. The all-black upper keeps 'em easy to style, while visible Nike Air cushioning delivers all-star comfort.

title: Air Jordan 1 Low SE
description: Luxe embroidery and a subdued palette bring a vibe of understated cool to the AJ1 Low. The special-edition Swoosh adds a hint of shine to kicks that look good (and feel good) no matter where you wear them.

title: Nike Air Max Koko
description: Deceptively comfortable, obviously fun. Step out in bright ginghams and a no-tie design. The thick foam midsole and visible Max Air unit will have you wondering why your other platforms aren't this comfortable.

title: Nike Vaporfly 2
description: Continue the next evolution of speed with a racing shoe made to help you chase new goals and records. It helps improve comfort and breathability with a redesigned upper. From a 10K to a marathon, this model, like the previous version, has the responsive cushioning and secure support to push you towards your personal best.

title: Nike Fontanka Waffle
description: Let a new wave of style take hold in the Nike Fontanka Waffle. Crossing fashion with sport, this sleek athletics design nods to the iconic Daybreak with classic suede details and a Waffle outsole. Embroidered Swoosh logos on the heel, deco-stitching and the soft collar merge craft with comfort.

title: Nike Victori One
description: From the beach to the streets, the Nike Victori One perfects a classic, must-have design. Delivering lightweight comfort that's easy to wear, it features new, softer foam that feels comfortable. The contoured footbed with grip pattern helps cradle and hold your foot in place. The wide, padded strap feels as good as it looks.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom GP Turbo Naomi Osaka
description: Naomi Osaka stands up for what she believes in. This special version of the GP Turbo shines a light both on her style and her social stances loud and proud. Designed for hard courts, where Naomi crafted a ferocious, fast-paced game, it combines a responsive Zoom Air unit with zones of durability to help you stay fresh longer.

title: Nike Zoom Fly 5 Premium
description: Bridge the gap between your weekend training run and race day in this durable design. Wear this neutral road runner for your favourite race and in the days after your conquest. It offers comfort, stability and reliability but with a propulsive sensation that helps you feel fast and fresh. That kind of versatility is uncommon in the running arena. But who said you can't have it all? This special watercolour-like graphic with floral pastels and subtle pinks captures the vibe of the summer season.

title: Air Jordan 5 Retro Low
description: Chop the top off, why not? All the key elements of the original AJ5 are here, now in a low-profile design. The unmissable midsole is set off by reflective-design uppers that really help your kicks shine.
